posts.title: Sand Toppling Tower
posts.caption: It's a sand toppling tower. It topples over sand into the sand wagon that just pulls by a train, pulling another wagon, but longer, and the train is also longer, and the track is on my bed. That's it.

posts.title: Trains Rail Vehicle and Cargo
posts.caption: I did know a best way to connect the orange door to my... empty... to my train engine. I did it. By myself. And what about the car? It has two sets of railway wheels... I mean four sets of railway wheels and four sets of road wheels. The cargo car has a... the cargo wagon has a... tomatoes, one plantain, some cauliflowers, and also some paint. And also there is a... there is a water dish... dish. And there are logs at the end. And there are tomatoes and also a cabbage leaf. And the back should go in... here. Which is... this is the dock and we add this ladder here for big emergencies.

posts.title: Shinkansen
posts.caption: It's the Shinkansen! This is a trolley-rover baby pushed with Dad. He's ten hundred years old. And this boy is five hundred years old. And the baby is just one year old. Which is in here. This station is awesome. It features people. The Shinkansen, it has one wagon and it has two coaches.

posts.title: Electric Train In Snow
posts.caption: It's an electric train. With a railroad car and some snow. A lot of snow. Goodbye.

posts.title: Electric Big Boy Train
posts.caption: This train is an electric big boy train. It has some plantings, tomatoes, cabbage, cabbage, cauliflowers, and also a present, and some logs. And the train looks good, featuring a driver and a battery box. The rooftop deck looks good with these two fans. These two fans are really good to make cool air. But, but the air from these grills penetrates here through these when entering this mouth of cow.

posts.title: WALL-E, Tarhanchik, and Robots Friendship
posts.caption: All of the robots are broken. But WALL-E is the only one who survived. And he has a friend. This is his friend. And this is Tarhanchik. It's a cockroach. Yes, WALL-E has a little cockroach. The second robot isn't perfect. It is a broken robot. I have to say, perfect but not perfect. All of these robots are broken, except for one. It doesn't have a caterpillar tread. And there is only one tread left but WALL-E has two.

posts.title: Train with Car Transport
posts.caption: It's a train with a car that is on a train wagon. The train moves with it and connects and unconnects. Wow, anything to add? It's pretty good, I believe so.

posts.title: Water Train Wagon
posts.caption: It's a water train wagon. It carries water.

posts.title: Lumber Lifting Car
posts.caption: It's a lumber lifting car. Look, the waves! How does it work? The forks lift up small lumber pieces. What else? The car drives it, and it unconnects. And it snows? The wheels turn, except for the trailer's wheels. And that's all of it.
